About

Who am I?

I am Christina Mae Gerzon, 20 years old from Balo-i, Lanao del Norte. I am a 3rd year student of Information Technology at Mindanao State University - Iligan Institute of Technology.

I love to stay in-doors but would also love to go out if someone invites me to go somewhere. I like to listen to music and watch movies or series in my free time.
